example.caption: A XEP-0199 Ping with Traceroute Request

section1.example: <iq from='romeo@mantague.lit/home' to='juliet@capulet.lit/balcony' id='s2c1' type='get'> <ping xmlns='urn:xmpp:ping'> <traceroute xmlns='urn:xmpp:traceroute:0'> <send by='romeo@montague.lit/home' to='montague.lit' timestamp='TODO'> <connection-security>TLS...</connection-security> </send> </traceroute> </ping> </iq>

section1.p: An entity that follows the buisness rules and supports XMPP traceroute SHOULD announce the 'urn:xmpp:traceroute:0' namespace in its disco features.
